#
#Point file test for 500x500 in pattern locations
#

#Create a frame with 500x500 pixels (top left should be 0,0,255)
INIT 500 500

# Draw some red points and pause for .4seconds after all are drawn

POINT 40 40 (255,0,0,255)
POINT 50 40 (0,255,0,255)
POINT 60 40 (0, 0,255,255)
